page.title: 14SATURDAY IN THE LIFE OF HAI
page.content:
On Saturday in the morning,I got up at 10 o clock.I went downstairs and made my breakfast.I had egg,bread and orange drink.I went with my mother and Son(brother) to Padgate station.We got the ticket and 5 minutes later the train came.We got off at Oxford Road in Manchester.We went for some Chinese food and we went to the Chinese school.It start at 2 pm and stop at 4 pm.I go every Saturday. In Chinese I can spell people, hand, mouth, boat, flower,football,swimming and some more.In Spelling I got 36 out of 40.When we are in school my mummy was shopping and she got 4 bags full with food.The train time for going home is 4.45 and we get home at 5.15.Then I play with my friends.Sometimes I ride my bike or watch TV.
by HAI HOANG age 10
